Episodes.Title: The Dundies
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael hosts the annual Dundie Awards at a local restaurant, but the night takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Jim and Pam share a moment that could change everything.

Episodes.Title: Sexual Harassment
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: The office reviews its sexual harassment policy in light of explicit e-mails.

Episodes.Title: Office Olympics
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Ready to finalize his deal for a new condo, Michael is away with Dwight while Jim rallies the staff together for office games.

Episodes.Title: The Fire
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: A fire in the kitchen relegates the staff to the parking lot as help is on its way.

Episodes.Title: Halloween
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael is pressured by corporate to fire someone, which puts a damper on the office Halloween party.

Episodes.Title: The Fight
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Gene Stupnitsky, Lee Eisenberg
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Jim rallies the staff together to witness a showdown between Michael and Dwight at Dwight's martial arts school.

Episodes.Title: The Client
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: With Michael and Jan Levinson-Gould away from the office to land a new client, the staff discovers an unproduced screenplay in Michael's office.

Episodes.Title: Performance Review
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Larry Wilmore, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Instead of talking to his employees about their work, Michael uses their annual review time to gather feedback on his "relationship" with Jan.

Episodes.Title: E-Mail Surveillance
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael decides to set up e-mail surveillance for all company e-mail, and discovers that Jim has invited everyone over for a barbeque except him.

Episodes.Title: Christmas Party
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Seeing the party is headed for disastrous boredom, Michael breaks corporate policy to buy alcohol for the staff.

Episodes.Title: Booze Cruise
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: The Dunder Mifflin staff go on a mandatory "booze cruise" to hear Michael give a motivational talk.

Episodes.Title: The Injury
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael's "injury" from a George Foreman Grill distracts the staff from Dwight, the one with the real injury.

Episodes.Title: The Secret
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Lee Eisenberg, Gene Stupnitsky
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Jim fears the secret he told to Michael, in confidence, will be revealed to the staff.

Episodes.Title: The Carpet
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael's office becomes the victim of an odorous prank which subjects the office to his punishment.

Episodes.Title: Boys and Girls
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Jan comes into the Scranton Branch to give all the female employees a group seminar on women in the workplace. Upset that he is not allowed in on the proceedings, Michael takes all the men down into the warehouse for some "guy time."

Episodes.Title: Valentine's Day
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: When Michael visits Dunder Mifflin corporate headquarters in New York on Valentine's Day, he and Jan are both in for a surprise. Meanwhile, back in Scranton, the office staff celebrates Valentine's Day grade school style.

Episodes.Title: Dwight's Speech
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael coaches pompous Dwight on the finer art of public speaking after being named as Salesman of the Year.

Episodes.Title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Children come to Dunder Mifflin for Take Your Daughter to Work Day. Michael is surprised when he strikes up a friendship with Toby's daughter. Pam is desperate to befriend her colleagues' offspring and Ryan is put under Stanley's ...

Episodes.Title: Michael's Birthday
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Gene Stupnitsky, Lee Eisenberg
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: In celebration of his birthday, Michael makes a mandatory invite of the staff during the workday to go ice skating.

Episodes.Title: Drug Testing
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Dwight plays the role of Volunteer Sheriff after finding half a joint in the Dunder Mifflin parking lot leading to an investigation. Pam gives Jim a play challenge which he tries to complete.

Episodes.Title: Conflict Resolution
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: When Michael takes over conflict resolution duties from HR, chaos ensues at Dunder Mifflin.

Episodes.Title: Casino Night
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Steve Carell, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: The Dunder Mifflin crew holds a casino party at the warehouse and Michael has two dates.
